title: Claude Opus 4 and Sonnet 4 Technical Review: The Best Coding Models for Developers?
title1: Claude Opus 4 and Sonnet 4 Technical Review: The Best Coding Models for Developers?
title2: Claude Opus 4 and Sonnet 4 Technical Review: The Best Coding Models for Developers?
description: Anthropic just dropped Claude 4 with two new models: Opus 4 and Sonnet 4. Both feature enhanced hybrid reasoning and claim to be the world's best coding models. We dive deep into their capabilities, benchmarks, and what Anthropic's developer-first strategy means for the future.
author: Yusuf Ishola
